languages.text: {n}Обратив лицо к разом погасшей, будто ушедшей в себя Кибелле, старец шепчет:{/n} "Тогда ищи проводника душ. Искусника, что погрузит вас в псайкерский транс и даст вашим разумам сойтись в одно. Капелла твоя, Домин, полна астропатов — кто-нибудь из них послужит тебе. Бери сильного проводника душ, ибо в душе Второго ткача тебя ждут... чудовища. Разум, полный сомнений, — опасное место".

traits.locale_text: "Пускай проводник, что умеет в мысли других погружаться, поможет. Хор астропатов полон таких — выбери самого сильного. В транс синхронный ввести вас ему пускай будет велено. И если связь Эним и тени достаточно сильная... ты погрузишься. Но помни: разум, полный сомнений, опасное место. Я же пока отступлю в тени обратно и буду ждать — известий добрых иль скверных".

languages.text: {n}The Vizsier turns his face toward Kibellah, who seems withdrawn, her spark snuffed out. He whispers,{/n} "Then seek a steward of souls. An artisan who will put you both in a psyker's trance, allowing your minds to become one. You have a chapel full of Astropaths, Domin. One of them will surely do you that service. See that their guidance is strong, for inside her soul, you will encounter... monsters. A doubt-ridden mind is a dangerous place."
languages.original_text: {n}Обратив лицо к разом погасшей, будто ушедшей в себя Кибелле, старец шепчет:{/n} "Тогда ищи проводника душ. Бери сильного проводника душ, ибо в душе Второго ткача тебя ждут... чудовища. Разум, полный сомнений, — опасное место".

{n}The old man turns his face toward Kibellah, who seems withdrawn, her spark snuffed out. He whispers,{/n} "Then seek a steward of souls. An Oa who will put you both in a psyker's trance, allowing your minds to become one. You have a chapel full of Astropaths, Enim. One of them will surely do you that service. Take a strong soul steward with you, for inside the Second Weaver's soul, you are going to meet... monsters. A doubt-ridden mind is a dangerous place."

languages.text: {n}Le vizir se tourne vers Kibellah, qui reste en retrait, comme éteinte. Il murmure :{/n} « Dans ce cas, il faut trouver un intendant des âmes. Un artisan qui vous plongera {mf|tous|toutes} deux dans une transe et permettra à vos esprits de ne faire plus qu'un. L'un des astropathes de votre chapelle acceptera sûrement de vous rendre ce service, Domin. Mais il vous faut trouver un bon guide, car en explorant son âme, vous croiserez... des monstres. Un esprit rongé par le doute est semé de dangers. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier turns his face toward Kibellah, who seems withdrawn, her spark snuffed out. He whispers,{/n} "Then seek a steward of souls. An artisan who will put you both in a psyker's trance, allowing your minds to become one. You have a chapel full of Astropaths, Domin. One of them will surely do you that service. See that their guidance is strong, for inside her soul, you will encounter... monsters. A doubt-ridden mind is a dangerous place."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vizir se tourne vers Kibellah, qui reste en retrait, comme éteinte. Il murmure :{/n} « Dans ce cas, il faut trouver un intendant des âmes. Un artisan qui vous plongera {mf|tous|toutes} deux dans une transe et permettra à vos esprits de ne faire plus qu'un. L'un des astropathes de votre chapelle acceptera sûrement de vous rendre ce service, Domin. Mais il vous faut trouver un bon guide, car en explorant son âme, vous croiserez... des monstres. Un esprit rongé par le doute est semé de dangers. »

languages.text: {n}El Visir se gira hacia Kibellah, que parece retraída, como si su chispa interior se hubiera extinguido. Susurra:{/n} «Busquen a un guía de almas. A un artesano que pueda sumirlos en un trance psíquico, uniendo sus mentes. Tiene toda una capilla de Astrópatas, Domin. Alguno tendrá que poder prestar ese servicio. Asegúrese de que su guía es fuerte, pues en el interior de su alma verá... monstruos. Una mente dubitativa es un lugar peligroso».
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier turns his face toward Kibellah, who seems withdrawn, her spark snuffed out. He whispers,{/n} "Then seek a steward of souls. An artisan who will put you both in a psyker's trance, allowing your minds to become one. You have a chapel full of Astropaths, Domin. One of them will surely do you that service. See that their guidance is strong, for inside her soul, you will encounter... monsters. A doubt-ridden mind is a dangerous place."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Visir se gira hacia Kibellah, que parece retraída, como si su chispa interior se hubiera extinguido. Susurra:{/n} «Busquen a un guía de almas. A un artesano que pueda sumirlos en un trance psíquico, uniendo sus mentes. Tiene toda una capilla de Astrópatas, Domin. Alguno tendrá que poder prestar ese servicio. Asegúrese de que su guía es fuerte, pues en el interior de su alma verá... monstruos. Una mente dubitativa es un lugar peligroso».

languages.text: {n}ヴィジールはキベラの方を向くが、キベラは心を開いていない様子で火花は消えた。{/n}「では、魂の世話役を探すのです。ある職人はふたり同時に異能者の力でトランス状態にして、心をひとつにしてくれます。ドミン、あなたの礼拝堂にはたくさんの感応通信官がいますね。その中のひとりが必ずあなたの力になってくれます。見えます…その者の強い導きで彼女の魂の中に入り、出会うことになる…怪物達に。疑心暗鬼に陥った心は危険な場所です」
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier turns his face toward Kibellah, who seems withdrawn, her spark snuffed out. He whispers,{/n} "Then seek a steward of souls. An artisan who will put you both in a psyker's trance, allowing your minds to become one. You have a chapel full of Astropaths, Domin. One of them will surely do you that service. See that their guidance is strong, for inside her soul, you will encounter... monsters. A doubt-ridden mind is a dangerous place."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィジールはキベラの方を向くが、キベラは心を開いていない様子で火花は消えた。{/n}「では、魂の世話役を探すのです。ある職人はふたり同時に異能者の力でトランス状態にして、心をひとつにしてくれます。ドミン、あなたの礼拝堂にはたくさんの感応通信官がいますね。その中のひとりが必ずあなたの力になってくれます。見えます…その者の強い導きで彼女の魂の中に入り、出会うことになる…怪物達に。疑心暗鬼に陥った心は危険な場所です」

languages.text: {n}宿老将目光转向绮贝菈。绮贝菈似乎退缩了，目光中的火焰也熄灭了。宿老低声开了口。{/n}“既然如此，就去寻找一位灵魂的指引者吧。寻找一位能让你们两人进入灵能恍惚状态的艺术家，让你们两人的意识合二为一。您的礼拜堂里有许多星语者，秘者，其中肯定有人能协助您。要确保这个人的指引强而有力，因为在她的灵魂深处，您会遇到……怪物。充满疑虑的头脑是最危险的所在。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier turns his face toward Kibellah, who seems withdrawn, her spark snuffed out. He whispers,{/n} "Then seek a steward of souls. An artisan who will put you both in a psyker's trance, allowing your minds to become one. You have a chapel full of Astropaths, Domin. One of them will surely do you that service. See that their guidance is strong, for inside her soul, you will encounter... monsters. A doubt-ridden mind is a dangerous place."

traits.locale_text: {n}宿老将目光转向绮贝菈。绮贝菈似乎退缩了，目光中的火焰也熄灭了。宿老低声开了口。{/n}“既然如此，就去寻找一位灵魂的指引者吧。寻找一位能让你们两人进入灵能恍惚状态的艺术家，让你们两人的意识合二为一。您的礼拜堂里有许多星语者，秘者，其中肯定有人能协助您。要确保这个人的指引强而有力，因为在她的灵魂深处，您会遇到……怪物。充满疑虑的头脑是最危险的所在。”

languages.text: {n}Der Wesir wendet sich Kibellah zu, die distanziert wirkt, ihr Funke erloschen. Er flüstert:{/n} "Dann sucht Euch einen Seelenverwalter. Einen Künstler, der Euch in eine psionische Trance versetzt, auf dass Eure Geister eins werden können. Ihr habt eine Kapelle voller Astropathen, Domin. Einer von ihnen wird Euch diesen Dienst gewiss erweisen. Achtet darauf, dass seine Führung stark ist, denn in ihrer Seele erwarten Euch ... Monster. Ein zweifelnder Geist ist ein gefährlicher Ort."
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier turns his face toward Kibellah, who seems withdrawn, her spark snuffed out. He whispers,{/n} "Then seek a steward of souls. An artisan who will put you both in a psyker's trance, allowing your minds to become one. You have a chapel full of Astropaths, Domin. One of them will surely do you that service. See that their guidance is strong, for inside her soul, you will encounter... monsters. A doubt-ridden mind is a dangerous place."

Einen Künstler, der Euch in eine psionische Trance versetzt, auf dass Eure Geister eins werden können. Ihr habt eine Kapelle voller Astropathen, Domin. Einer von ihnen wird Euch diesen Dienst gewiss erweisen. Achtet darauf, dass seine Führung stark ist, denn in ihrer Seele erwarten Euch ... Monster. Ein zweifelnder Geist ist ein gefährlicher Ort."

languages.text: {n}Vezir; içine kapanmış gibi duran, öfkesi sönmüş Kibellah'ya yüzünü dönüyor.{/n} "O hâlde bir ruh koruyucusu, ikinizi birden bir ruhsezer transına sokarak zihinlerinizin bütün olmasını sağlayacak bir zanaatkâr bulmalısınız. Astropatlarla dolu bir şapeliniz var Domin. Aralarından biri muhakkak ki bu hizmeti yerine getirecektir. Astropatın kılavuzluğunun kuvvetinden emin olun. Zira Kibellah'nın ruhunda karşınıza... Canavarlar çıkacak. Kuşkuyla dolup taşan bir zihin, tehlikeli bir yerdir."
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier turns his face toward Kibellah, who seems withdrawn, her spark snuffed out. He whispers,{/n} "Then seek a steward of souls. An artisan who will put you both in a psyker's trance, allowing your minds to become one. You have a chapel full of Astropaths, Domin. One of them will surely do you that service. See that their guidance is strong, for inside her soul, you will encounter... monsters. A doubt-ridden mind is a dangerous place."
